[[inst_hl_lhi_u]]
==== HL.LHI.U

*Syntax:* hl.lhi.u [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhi_u.svg[HL.LHI.U encoding,width=800]
